attributes.action: Set Up a Helpline to Report Nuisance Call Centres
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At least 5 or 6 times a day I am getting 'silent' calls from annoying call centres. I am fed up of these, they are a nuisance. I feel that there should be a Government run helpline/watchdog to report nuisance call centres so they can be dealt with appropriately
